  • Constructor Details

    • AbandonedStationEndState

      public AbandonedStationEndState(Card_AbandonedStation abandonedStation) throws Exception
      Represents the end state of an abandoned station card. Extends the generic AbandonedStationState and marks the final phase within the lifecycle of the card's state.
      Parameters:
      abandonedStation - the specific instance of Card_AbandonedStation that this state is associated with
      Throws:
      Exception - if there is an issue initializing the state

  • Method Details

    • activate

      public void activate(FlightBoard flightBoard) throws Exception
      Activates the abandoned station end state, setting the appropriate state and initiating the surrender timer for the game.
      Specified by:
      activate in class AbandonedStationState
      Parameters:
      flightBoard - the FlightBoard instance associated with the current game state
      Throws:
      Exception - if an error occurs during state activation

    • getNextState

      public AbandonedStationState getNextState() throws RuntimeException
      Retrieves the next state for an AbandonedStationState. In the context of the AbandonedStationEndState, this method returns itself as this is the final state in the state transition.
      Specified by:
      getNextState in class AbandonedStationState
      Returns:
      the current state, as this represents the final state with no subsequent state.
      Throws:
      RuntimeException - if called in an unexpected scenario.
